02473435&chksm=f790207ec0e7a9680b6c4e041bf113059f9fd8e3cf3716511ade44a2c0c0e1b58becdd2ddc35&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"https://mp.weixin.qq.com/mp/profile_ext?action=home&__biz=MzI5MTA5OTc2OQ==&scene=124#wechat_redirect","cover":"http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/Pia0H4HMzicl6Q7TgicPDhHqD2F9Ueg9rDJMLsjShCuriaFicvl64QQiabSpRG7iaIukDLurstzhLN5g2mDSNxT3vrGFQ/0?wx_fmt=jpeg","author":"","copyright_stat":100,"del_flag":1,"item_show_type":0,"audio_fileid":0,"duration":0,"play_url":"","malicious_title_reason_id":0,"malicious_content_type":0},{"title":"六月，愿我们：心怀美好，一路同行！","digest":"时光，从指缝间悄然滑落；日子，平平淡淡地走过。仿佛刚走进五月的浅夏，转身之间，我们却迎来了热情奔放的六月。

岁月匆匆像一阵风，带走多少欢乐和不舍？而我们依然要重复着同样的步伐，迎来日出和日落，别过月圆和月缺，挥手一月又一月，走过一年又一年。

回不去的是时光，无法重来的是人生。要走的留不住，该来的挡不住。相遇是缘，离别也是缘，相信一切都是最好的安排。唯有轻轻地道一句：五月再见，六月你好！

站在新的起点，愿我们每个人都心中有爱，眼里有光，脸上有笑；愿我们都能勇敢坚强，乐观自信，知足常乐；愿我们一路亲朋相伴，知己同行，心怀美好，去遇见最美的风景。","content":"","fileid":0,"content_url":"http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzI5MTA5OTc2OQ==&mid=2658223464&idx=3&sn=6f03efa655bc4fd356b18810591dd4fc&chksm=f790207ec0e7a9684f2a565815d865b476be70b80c9a6dd9631eee1c7fb9abad1ad429230836&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"","cover":"http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/Pia0H4HMzicl7JEZtQ9Y4loQG9l326G8JRJ7dZBKgDa2zq8rzaPZrjEqJgJ4yYweXXFialEL2RribMrgYvEKIbvCYg/0?wx_fmt=jpeg","author":"","copyright_stat":100,"del_flag":1,"item_show_type":5,"audio_fileid":0,"duration":0,"play_url":"","malicious_title_reason_id":0,"malicious_content_type":0},{"title":"聆听最美的旋律《让心飞翔》","digest":"与其把目光放在遥远的、不可控的未来，不如暂时放松自我，在萨克斯《让心飞翔》空灵悠扬中，让心翱翔。","content":"","fileid":0,"content_url":"http://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzI5MTA5OTc2OQ==&mid=2658223464&idx=4&sn=8217df6be1ca9f45512ccb91ea484079&chksm=f790207ec0e7a968d63394836ca83b7bf3ccef2e5c1e0b0b7db044cc053238522318c1ac3298&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"","cover":"http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_jpg/Pia0H4HMzicl5GE8K2DTMYvMVsoMPKvJnm3zSEgfh7jVPoUMhibjRThRHyc4I89hcAicTemTt2l1amfaTghClqyyQA/0?wx_fmt=jpeg","author":"","copyright_stat":100,"del_flag":1,"item_show_type":5,"audio_fileid":0,"duration":0,"play_url":"","malicious_title_reason_id":0,"malicious_content_type":0},{"title":"唯美轻音乐《安妮之歌》清新自然，治愈心灵","digest":"今天分享的是班得瑞的《Annie's Song》（安妮之歌），选自其专辑《Wonderland》（仙境）。

钢琴和长笛联合演奏，纯净而丰富的钢琴声微微荡开，柔如冬日阳光，盈盈亮亮，温暖平静，没有一点杂音，每一个音符都像敲击在灵魂中，即便你不知道它所讲述的是什么，依然会莫名的感动。
